title: Ensure brand name 'Parvati Pretty Lab' is displayed consistently across the entire site

requirements.text: Ensure the brand name 'Parvati Pretty Lab' is displayed consistently and correctly across all locations in the site: the Header logo/wordmark, the HeroSection headline or overlay card, the Footer brand name, the browser tab title in frontend/index.html <title>, and any other component or page where the site name appears. Remove or correct any instances where the name is truncated, misspelled, or displayed in a different casing.

quotes: change the name to parvati pretty lab

acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab title in frontend/index.html reads exactly 'Parvati Pretty Lab'
The Header logo/wordmark displays exactly 'Parvati Pretty Lab'
The HeroSection overlay card or headline displays exactly 'Parvati Pretty Lab'
The Footer brand name displays exactly 'Parvati Pretty Lab'
No other component or page displays a truncated, misspelled, or differently-cased version of the brand name
The change is consistent across all pages: HomePage, CatalogPage, ProductDetailPage, CartDrawer, CheckoutPage, OrderConfirmationPage

constraints: Do not alter any visual theme, color palette, typography, or layout â€” only the brand name text
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
nonGoals: Changing any other content, copy, or product data
Modifying the backend actor or data models
Altering the WhatsApp contact number or order flow
